mapper.select: SELECT col.table_name, col.column_name as name, col.ordinal_position as sort, d.description as comment, col.table_schema as schema, col.udt_name as type FROM information_schema.columns col LEFT JOIN pg_namespace ns ON col."table_name"=ns.nspname LEFT JOIN pg_class c ON ns.oid=c.relnamespace AND c.relname = col.table_name LEFT JOIN pg_description d ON d.objoid = c.oid AND d.objsubid = col.ordinal_position WHERE col.table_schema=#{schema} AND col.table_name=#{tableName} ORDER BY col.table_name, col.ordinal_position;

SELECT tb.table_name as name, d.description as comment, tb.table_schema as schema FROM information_schema.tables tb LEFT JOIN pg_namespace ns on ns.nspname=tb.table_schema LEFT JOIN pg_class c ON c.relnamespace=ns.oid AND c.relname = tb.table_name LEFT JOIN pg_description d ON d.objoid = c.oid AND d.objsubid = '0' WHERE tb.table_schema=#{schema}
